item.title: About
item.description:
üëã Hey, I’m Aman! #

I’m a data engineer & data scientist, currently pursuing my Master‚Äôs at the University of San Francisco. My work revolves around scalable data systems, distributed computing, and geospatial analytics‚Äîwhere I leverage large-scale datasets to generate real-world insights.

üí° What I Do #

üîπ Big Data & ML Engineering ‚Äì I build high-throughput data pipelines and optimize large-scale data processing.
üîπ Geospatial Analytics ‚Äì I work on geospatial ML applications, leveraging satellite imagery, remote sensing data, and spatial databases.
üîπ Automation & Efficiency ‚Äì I streamline data workflows and optimize computational efficiency for scalable AI applications.

item.title: Scraping UFO Data: A Journey into the Unknown
item.description:
Have you ever gazed up at the night sky and wondered about unexplained lights or mysterious sightings? In my latest project, I set out to collect UFO sightings data from public websites and transform it into a usable dataset for analysis.

This post walks you through how I built a web scraper using Python‚Äîtransforming raw HTML into a neat CSV file ready for data exploration.

item.title: Automating Blog Comments with AI: GPT4All & Giscus Integration
item.description:
Engagement is crucial for any blog, but manually responding to every post can be time-consuming. What if your blog could generate thoughtful comments automatically?

I developed a bot that does exactly that‚Äîleveraging GPT4All for offline AI-generated comments and Giscus for seamless integration with GitHub Discussions. This solution eliminates reliance on cloud-based APIs, ensuring full privacy, cost-efficiency, and automation.

item.title: üöÄ Automating Geospatial Data for The Nature Conservancy
item.description:
üåç Scaling Environmental Data Processing with a Custom CLI Tool

As part of my work with The Nature Conservancy (TNC), I developed a custom CLI tool to automate geospatial data processing. This tool streamlines the retrieval, transformation, and analysis of satellite imagery and GIS data, enabling conservationists to focus on real-world environmental impact rather than tedious manual workflows.
